verses.1: Topa aw, na itna kip la-in ka sa tawntung dinga, nangma thutakna ka gen tawntung ding hi.
verses.2: Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma itna kip tawntung a, na thutakna zong vantung bangin kip tawntung hi.
verses.3: Nangmah in, “Ka teelpa tawh thuciamna ka bawl zo a, ka nasem David tungah thu ka ciam zo hi:
verses.4: ‘Na suan na khakte kumpi-in ka kipsak dinga, na kumpi gam khang tawntungin ka kipsak ding hi,’” na ci khin hi.
verses.5: Topa aw, na nasepna a lamdangte, vantungte phatsak inla, mi siangthoteʼ kikhopna sungah na thumanna phatsak in.
verses.6: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa pen vantung a kua tawh kiteh thei ding ahi hiam? Mi siangthoteʼ kikhopna sungah a kizahtak Pasian, a kiim a omte khempeuh tungah lianin a zahtakhuai Topa pen van miteʼ lakah kua pen tawh kibang ahi hiam?
verses.8: Vanglian Topa Pasian aw, na khempeuh ah na thutak a, nangmah bangin a vanglian kua om ahi hiam, Topa aw.
verses.9: Nang in tuipi khang na uk a, a tuihualte a san ciangin na daisak hi.
verses.10: Nangmah in a kithat lum sa luanghawm khat bangin ganhing golpi Rahab na su gawp a, na thahatna tawh na galte na zo gawp hi.
verses.11: Vantungte nangma aʼ hi a, leitung zong nangma aʼ mah ahi hi. Leitung le a sunga om khempeuh nangma phuh sa ahi hi.
verses.12: Saklam le khanglamte nangma bawl sa hi a, Tabor mual le Hermon mual in lungdamna tawh na min hong phat uh hi.
verses.13: Nangma vang lian mahmah a, na thahatna kigen thei lo hi.
verses.14: Thuman le thutang tawh na ukna za na phut a, itna kip le thuman tawh na khempeuh na sem hi.
verses.15: Topa aw, lungdamin lasakna tawh nang hong bia a, na migitna khuavak sungah nuam takin a nungta, nangma hangin sun thapai-in lungdam a, nangma hoihna hong phat mite mi nuamsa ahi uh hi.
verses.17: Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in nakpi takin kote na hong gualzosak a, kote hong angvanin na hong gualzosak hi.
verses.18: Kote a hong hu Topa hi a, Israel-teʼ Siangtho Pasian nangmah in ka kumpipa uh nong pia hi.
verses.19: Hun lui lai-in na thuman mipa tungah mang sungah thu na gen a, “A vanglian khat pa tungah lukhu ka koih khinzo a, mite lak panin a kiteng khia mi khat ka liansak zo hi.
verses.20: Ka nasem pa David ka mu zo hi. Ka thahatna ama tungah a om ngitnget theih nading, ka vangliatna in zong, amah a tha khauhsak theih nadingin ka sathau siangtho amah ka nilh khin hi.
verses.22: Galte in amah khem zo ngei lo dinga, migilote in zong amah zo ngei lo ding uh hi.
verses.23: Ama mai ah a galte ka su gawp dinga, amah a mudahte ka sat puk ding hi.
verses.24: Amah it tawntungin ama tungah ka thutak dinga, amah a gualzo-in ka bawl tawntung ding hi.
verses.25: Mediterranean Tuipi a kipan Eufratis Gunpi dong amah ka uksak ding hi.
verses.26: Amah in kei kiangah, ‘Nang pen keima Pa le ka Pasian na hi a, kei a hong hon khia pa le a hong hupa na hi hi,’ hong ci ding hi.
verses.27: Keimah in amah ta upa penin ka bawl dinga, leitung kumpite lakah a lian penin ka bawl ding hi.
verses.28: Amah ka itna ka kipsak tawntung dinga, ama tungah ka thuciamna ka kipsak tawntung ding hi.
verses.29: Ama suanlekhakte kumpi ka hisak ngitnget dinga, a ukna za, vantung bangin ka kipsak ding hi.
verses.30: “Ama tate in ka thukhamte nusia-in, ka biakna ngeina kip om bangin a gamtat kei uh a, amaute in ka ngeina siasakin ka thupiak a zuih kei uh leh, amauteʼ thupalsatna hangin ciang tawh gim ka pia dinga, amauʼ mawhnate hangin satna tawh gim ka pia ding hi.
verses.33: Ahih hangin amah ka itna ka khiam kei dinga, ka thuciamna ka kipelhsak kei ding hi.
verses.34: Ka thuciamna siasak loin, ka kam pan a paikhia thute ka kheel kei ding hi.
verses.35: “A tawntung a kimang dingin ka sianthona tawh khatvei ka kiciam khin a, Davidʼ tungah ka zuau kei ding hi.
verses.36: Ama suanlekhakte kizom paisuak dinga, van a ni a taan lai teng a kumpi gam ka kipsak ding hi.
verses.37: Khapi bangin tua pen kipsuak dinga, vantung a om lai teng kip ding hi,” na ci hi.
verses.38: Ahih hangin tu-in amah nialin na lawn khia a, na sathau nilh paʼ tungah na heh mahmah hi.
verses.39: Na nasem pa tawh na thuciamna na pelh khin a, ama kumpi lukhu leivui lakah na paihsak hi.
verses.40: Ama kulhte khempeuh na sukham khin a, ama galpanmun kipte a sia na suah khin hi.
verses.41: A pai khempeuh in ama nate sut gawp uh a, amah pen a veengteʼ nuihsat a suak hi.
verses.42: Ama galte na gualzosak a, ama galte na lungdamsak khin hi.
verses.43: Ama galhiamte a mawkna na suaksak a, gal kidona ah amah na guallelsak hi.
verses.44: Nangmah in ama khut panin a kumpi ciangkhut na la khia a, a kumpi tokhom leilak na denna hi.
verses.45: Nangmah in a teek hun nai lopi-in amah na teeksak a, maizumna tawh na kidimsak hi.
verses.46: Topa aw, nang bang tanvei bucip den ding na hi hiam? Na hehna bang tanvei meikuang bangin kuangkuang ding ahi hiam?
verses.47: Topa aw, nuntak hun a tom mahmah lam hong phawk in. Mihingte a mawk nadingin bawl na hi hiam?
verses.48: A si thei lo kua om ahi hiam? Sihna hankhuk panin kua suakta zo ahi hiam?
verses.49: Topa aw, na thumanna tawh David tunga na thuciamna, hun lui lai-a na itna kip koi ah om ta ahi hiam?
verses.50: Topa aw, na nasem pa bangzah takin hong kithusim lohna, galte in phinna-in a hong neihna, Topa aw, amaute in na sathau nilh pa a paina khempeuh ah a hong nuihsatna uh hong phawk ta in.
verses.52: Topa in thupha ngah tawntung tahen. Amen! Amen!
